ygData.subject: Re: HS Key
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t try to charm him or you will find yourself running to the zone with a pissed off necromancer on your tail.  When I did my fang first I was playing my
ygData.messageBody:
>I finally got my xalgoz fang (4th attempt). For turning them into the necro
>frog, most people have told me to use wolf form. However this would require
>me dragging some friendly druid out of his way...
>
>SO is it possible to use sneak or charm?

Don't try to charm him or you will find yourself running to the zone with a
pissed off necromancer on your tail. When I did my fang first I was
playing my level 52 wizard. I was dubious to Xalgoz but he talked to me
and gave me the quest. So I turned in my parts and he said he would not
aid beings like me. I got a GM to restore my parts since Durgoz actually
did give me the quest text.
I then brought a 49th Enchanter along with me to charm him. Even though
Durgoz was green to the both of us he resisted the charm, started attacking
the enchanter. Resisted every root that I attempted to cast on him. I
killed his pet. He resisted every nuke I put on him, continued to resist
charm and mez from the enchanter.
The fight ended when both the enchanter and I found ourselves on the other
side of the zone line, quite beat up and licking our wounds. All we manage
to do was to kill his pet. I'm sure he is probably killable with melee
methods but don't try that charm stuff on him, he dosen't like it. :)

Lomack
